featured.text: The skydiver managed to land safely after jumping out of the aircraft, even though her _____ failed to open in midair.

definition.zh_def: 跳傘者，從飛機上跳下並使用降落傘安全著陸的人。
definition.en_def: A person who jumps from an aircraft and descends with a parachute.
definition.example: The skydiver performed an impressive freefall before opening his parachute.
